description.translate:
Before we seek an audience with $(b;summer)Queen Titania$(), you will have to prove your worth to me! 
Hmm...So a trial of combat! You will fight....
- The Pixie thinks deeply about what mortally wounding task she will give you - 
...a Golem! Yes an $(b;spring)Iron Golem$()! 
If you survive, I will deem you worthy to be in my presence.
If you survive....-the pixie giggles-...uh...cough cough...off you go!

What a battle! I had a few good laughs with your struggles 
but you pulled through in the end! Which is something. 
Not much, but something. Ah so funny! Ahum...
 What? You expected a reward? Your reward is being in my presence of course! 

 A reward...the audacity!
 You can have the scraps of the Golem I guess...
